item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: "Sailin' Shoes", Bearfoot, Boone Creek, Earl Scruggs, Nickel Creek, The Seldom Scene 1979, The Stanley Brothers, The Steeldrivers, Trampled By Turtles, William Elliot Whitmore.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 11/2012
item.description: Including: "Walt Whitman", Carrie Brown, Gentle On My Mind, Hey Joe, Osborne Brothers, Punch Brothers, Sierra Hull, The Weight, Tony Rice, Toxic.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 10/2012
item.description: Including: "Tennessee Stud", Attaboy, Bela Fleck, Bluegrass All-Stars, Freight Train, Iron Horse, Live @ Jooniors, Punch Brothers, Steam Powered Aereoplane, Whiskey Shivers.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 9/2012
item.description: Including: Another Dobro God, Black Rock, Crooked Still, Jerry Douglas, John Hartford, M. Tallstrom, Punch Brothers, Rosa Lee Mcfall, Stanley Brothers, Trampled By Turtles.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 8/2012
item.description: Including: Bela Fleck, Bill Monroe, Blue Highway, Carolina Chocolate Drops, Crooked Still, Look At Miss Ohio, Punch Brothers, Telluride House Band 2012, The Modern Grass, Tim O'Brien Band.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 7/2012
item.description: Including: Bad Livers, Chris Thile & Tim O'Brien, Flickertail Holler, Grunge Grass, Long Black Veil, Slim Pickins, Soldier'S Joy, Steep Canyon Rangers, The Tony Rice Unit, Will White.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 6/2012
item.description: Including: Dooly, Future Folk, Humming House, Kenny Baker, Seven Handle Circus, Single Ladies, Slipstream, The Curly Wolf, The Root Diggers, The Toy Dolls.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 5/2012
item.description: Including: Black River String Band, Cherryholmes, Del Mccoury, Foggy Mountain Breakdown, Milkdrive, Nickel Creek, Old Crow Medicine Show, Punch Brothers, Sweet Potato Pie, Trampled By Turtles.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 4/2012
item.description: Including: Bascom Lamar Lunsford, Carolina Chocolate Drops, Finnders And Youngberg, Old Crow Medicine Show, Pert Near Sandstone, Punch Brothers, Todd Snider, Trampled By Turtles, Whistle Pigs, Ymsb With Brown Bird.

item.title: Bluegrass playlist for 3/2012
item.description: Including: .357 String Band (Rip), Bearfoot, Crooked Still, Earl Scruggs, In Honor Of Earl Scruggs, Larry And His Flask, The Bluegrass Album Band, The New Grass Revival, Trampled By Turtles, Whiskey Shivers.
